Skill Notes:

Mastermind: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 1 from Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion)
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Concealing Legerdemain: Can use Thievery to Conceal An Object of light Bulk
Legendary Thief: Can use Steal with a -5 penalty when hidden to take actively wielded and highly noticeable items
Pickpocket: Can attempt to Steal a closely-guarded object without penalty
Quick Unlock: Can Pick A Lock in 1 action
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on a selected type of item
Subtle Theft: Successful Steal inflicts -2 Perception on observers to detect/Remains undetected when using Palm An Object or Steal after a successful Create A Diversion
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Padded Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Gauntlet (+6 1d4+1 B; strength; trained); Greatpick (+6 1d10+1 P [Crit d12]; strength; trained); Shield Bash (+6 1d4+1 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strong Arm: +10 thrown weapon range
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 3
Dirty Trick: Successful Thievery vs. Reflex inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 rd, or until the target performs an Interact action on a critical success; critical failure inflicts prone on self
Mastermind: Successful Recall Knowledge to identify a creature inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks until the start of the next turn, or for 1 min on a critical success
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Wary Disarmament: +2 Armor Class vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +9 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Wary Disarmament: +2 saves vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
Legendary Thief Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 15, thievery rank (currently 2) >= 4 and pickpocket feature (currently 1)
Quick Unlock Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and thievery rank (currently 2) >= 3
